ComicInfo.Summary: Back in Black [Part 3]: The Danger Girls battle Ox's biker gang and interrupt the sale of the Black Seed to the mysterious Gentleman. The girls are bested, however, and the Gentleman captures both the ancient artifact and their friend Ruby. Back at the Gentleman's lair, Ruby is reunited with her long lost mother but their joy is short lived as the Gentleman has Ruby shot through the neck so that her mother will be forced to use the Black Seed to resurrect her daughter.
ComicInfo.Tags: South Dakota,Danger Girl,Abbey Chase,Johnny Barracuda,Silicon Valerie,Kid Dynamo,Sydney Savage,Ruby,Black Widows,Boston,Mister Giggles,Deuce,Secret Agent Zero
ComicInfo.Title: Back in Black [Part 3]
